name: Fitness
description: Some of my favorite activities are skiing, running, weightlifting, and cycling.
description2: I recently completed the Western Massachusetts Ironman 70.3 and plan to run my first marathon later this year.

name: Automotive
description: I have a passion for cars and like to stay up to date with latest trends in automotive engineering and technology.

name: Video Games
description: I also enjoy playing video games to wind down and keep in touch with many of my friends.
